notes.text:
This update for keybase-client fixes the following issues:

- Update the Image dependency to address CVE-2024-24792 (boo#1227167).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Parsing a corrupt or malicious image with invalid color indices can cause a panic.
notes.title: CVE description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
